intro_des1: Connect with other padel enthusiasts of all skill levels. Easily find partners for casual games, competitive matches, or even just practice sessions
intro_des2: Reserve padel courts at your favorite clubs with just a few taps. Browse available time slots, compare prices, and book instantly
intro_des3: Track your progress, analyze your performance, and discover valuable tips to improve your padel skills. Connect with coaches and join communities to take your game to the next level
intro_des4: Stay up-to-date with local padel tournaments, leagues, and social gatherings. Find exciting events to participate in and connect with the padel community in your area
get_notified_available: Get notified for available courts, grant your matches more visibility and discover your advanced statistics
best_hand: Best hand, court side, match try...
if_you_already_know: If you already know who you are playing with, you can invite them to join you
if_looking_players: If you are looking for players at your level
get_notified_des: Get notified for available courts, grant your matches more visibility and discover your advanced statistics
your_not_member: You are not a member of any group yet
dont_hesitate_create: Do not hesitate to create your own group, invite your friends, play, and improve together!
the_result_of_match: The result of the match will count for your level progress if you make it competitive
pass_must_least_6: Password must be at least 6 characters long
email_already_in_use: The account already exists for that email
name_must_least_3: Name must be at least 3 characters long
